Default.Field: raise(""" Source = #DW.Var_Source Current Operating Unit = #DW.Var_Curr_Operating_Unit Current Dimension = #DW.Var_Dim_Name Dimension Table = #DW.Var_Dimension_Table Maximum number of levels = #DW.Var_Curr_Dim_Max_Level Top members of the current dimension = #DW.Var_List_Dimension_Top_Members EBS Chart of Accounts = #DW.Var_EBS_COA Primary Column of the dimension = #DW.Var_Primary_Column_Name """)
